name: MasterEVAD - Traición Real
description:
Third project made with Unity for the Master of design and programming by EVAD School. This is a narrative adventure point and click 3D game. The player, as Juan, a soldier of the real army, returns to his village next to the king's castle. Juan discovers that his parents' house is demolished and now his lands belong to the king. Juan is determined to find out where his parents are, so he goes to the king's castle hoping to be allowed in as a war hero. There he must not tell which family he belongs to and he will have to go unnoticed until he finds out what is happening in the Kingdom.

2D and 3D Art by students of EVAD Masters
